AHRQDashboard.description: Main dashboard container that orchestrates all visualizations and data analysis for AHRQ research publications
capabilities: Switch between Overview, Network Analysis, Flow Analysis, and Trends tabs
Apply global filters for years, publication types, usage types, and research domains
Search publications by title, author, or keyword
Export filtered data in CSV or JSON format
data_access: Computed quality scores (0-100) based on completeness and rigor
Policy impact scores (0-100) based on keyword analysis
key_metrics: Publication distribution by type and year

NetworkGraph.description: Interactive force-directed graph showing author collaboration networks
capabilities: Visualize author collaborations as network connections
Color nodes by publication count or policy impact
Zoom and pan for detailed exploration
Click nodes to see author details
Hover edges to see collaboration details

node_properties.position: Determined by force simulation based on collaborations

interactions: Click node: Focus on author and show details

SankeyDiagram.description: Flow visualization showing how publications flow from types through usage patterns to policy impacts

flow_properties.width: Represents number of publications in flow

interactions: Hover flow: See publication count and details
Click node: Filter to show only flows through that node

TrendsAnalysis.description: Time-series visualizations showing publication trends over time

chart_types.name: Publication Volume
chart_types.description: Line chart showing publication counts by year

chart_types.name: Policy Impact Trends
chart_types.description: Area chart showing average policy impact scores over time

chart_types.name: Domain Evolution
chart_types.description: Stacked bar chart showing research domain distribution changes

chart_types.name: Quality Metrics
chart_types.description: Combined chart showing quality score trends

interactions: Brush selection: Zoom to time range
Click data point: Filter dashboard to that year

OverviewStats.description: Summary statistics and key metrics displayed as cards

metrics.name: Total Publications
metrics.description: Count of all publications in database

metrics.name: Average Policy Impact
metrics.description: Mean policy impact score across all publications

metrics.name: Total Authors
metrics.description: Count of unique authors across all publications
metrics.calculation: Unique count after parsing author strings

metrics.name: Active Years
metrics.description: Range of publication years in dataset
metrics.calculation: Min and max of publication_year field

FilterPanel.description: Advanced filtering controls for the entire dashboard

filter_types.name: Usage Types
filter_types.description: Filter by how AHRQ data was used
